message.content:
cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.RO 

Reasoning: The paper deals with decentralized control problems, which are typically studied in the systems and control (cs.SY) sub-category. The use of optimization techniques and the exploration of optimal strategies suggest that the paper may also belong to the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The consideration of multiple controllers and the focus on substitutability of actions suggest that the paper may also be relevant to the multi-agent systems (cs.MA) sub-category. Finally, the use of linear strategies and the characterization of optimal solutions suggest that the paper may also be relevant to the robotics (cs.RO) sub-category.
